attributes.action: to class hgv licence as a skilled job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like this goverment to class hgv drivers & hgv driving as a skilled  job.A hgv licence is a seperate driving test & requires a lot of skill &
 concentration to drive a 60ft long truck upto 44tons safely on our roads.The wages for this job have risen from £5.00 per hour in 1988 to around $8.00 per hour in 2009.The wages will stay low until this job is classed as a skilled job
